about_the_game:
Get the ultimate game boost now!

With this DLC, you'll be adding adorable and powerful animal companions to your game that will give you a significant boost in coin collection. Not only that, but you'll also get to enjoy new bonuses such as increased movement speed and diamond mining capabilities.

As a bonus, we're giving you a one-time gift of +500 diamonds, which you can use to get your hands on one of these amazing creatures right away. With Premium pets DLC you'll never have to worry about running low on resources ever again!

So, what are you waiting for? Upgrade your game today and experience the joy of having your own loyal and efficient companions by your side. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to enhance your gaming experience - grab your Premium pets DLC now!

Get the ultimate game boost now!

With this DLC, you'll be adding adorable and powerful animal companions to your game that will give you a significant boost in coin collection. Not only that, but you'll also get to enjoy new bonuses such as increased movement speed and diamond mining capabilities.

As a bonus, we're giving you a one-time gift of +500 diamonds, which you can use to get your hands on one of these amazing creatures right away. With Premium pets DLC you'll never have to worry about running low on resources ever again!

So, what are you waiting for? Upgrade your game today and experience the joy of having your own loyal and efficient companions by your side. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to enhance your gaming experience - grab your Premium pets DLC now!
name: Dig Deep: Premium Pets

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

short_description: Get the ultimate game boost now!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish
